title: What are your research interests in the area of information technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am interested in it-assisted navigation and analysis of qualitative data. By this I do not mean search of large text corpora (resulting in single search results and possibly lists of the same) but the comprehensive, simultaneous sensing of all major aspects of the content. Think of it this way: In stead of google n-gram viewer enlightening us on one or a very limited selection of topics at the time, it would show the kind of “body” that is given shape by tapping into a multitude of distinctions.
